data.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
data.passiveDescription: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by {{12//15//18//21//24%}}. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals {{100//125//150//175//200%}} ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.
